column4: I'm new to Ubuntu-- trying to slowly convert from Win98 via a dual HD boot-- tried to follow Herman's advice with GAG and cant get Ubuntu to boot from HDb.  Where would I go for help please?
Where do I go for help to begin to use Ubuntu from a dual boot please?  Ex Windows 98 user
It is on disk b tks
Yes windoows on a and ubuntu on b
Will gag enable me to actually boot from b, or does it have to insert in Windows boot sector on a?
Dual boot from GAG, can it boot ubuntu with grub on b???
UBOTU, can gag boot from b or does grub have to be in windows boot sectoron a??
the BIOS selects the first drive, so grub has to be on the mbr of the first drive
there is a "terminal" program on the accessory menu
that works, I have one box I boot that way.
which is called "terminal" on the menu but the name of the program is gnome-terminal
you have to mount the floppy and copy the /boot directory to it
